00087 Comm::~Comm() {
00088   set<IOHandler *> handlers;
00089   m_handler_map_ptr->decomission_all(handlers);
00090 
00091   foreach(IOHandler *handler, handlers)
00092     handler->shutdown();
00093 
00094   // Since Comm is a singleton, this is OK
00095   ReactorFactory::destroy();
00096 
00097   // wait for all decomissioned handlers to get purged by Reactor
00098   m_handler_map_ptr->wait_for_empty();
00099 }

00164 void
00165 Comm::listen(struct sockaddr_in &addr, ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr &chf_ptr,
00166              DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00167   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00168   IOHandlerAccept *accept_handler;
00169   int one = 1;
00170   int sd;
00171 
00172   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP)) < 0)
00173     HT_THROW(Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR, strerror(errno));
00174 
00175   // Set to non-blocking
00176   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00177 
00178 #if defined(__linux__)
00179   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00180     HT_ERRORF("setting TCP_NODEPLAY: %s", strerror(errno));
00181 
00182 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00183   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00184     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00185 #endif
00186 
00187   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00188     HT_ERRORF("setting SO_REUSEADDR: %s", strerror(errno));
00189 
00190   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0)
00191     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_BIND_ERROR, "binding to %s: %s",
00192               InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), strerror(errno));
00193 
00194   if (::listen(sd, 1000) < 0)
00195     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_LISTEN_ERROR, "listening: %s", strerror(errno));
00196 
00197   handler = accept_handler = new IOHandlerAccept(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr,
00198                                                  m_handler_map_ptr, chf_ptr);
00199   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(accept_handler);
00200   accept_handler->start_polling();
00201 }

00204 int
00205 Comm::send_request(const sockaddr_in &addr, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00206                    CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *resp_handler) {
00207   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00208   IOHandlerDataPtr data_handler;
00209   int error = Error::OK;
00210 
00211   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_data_handler(addr, data_handler)) {
00212     HT_ERRORF("No connection for %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00213     return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00214   }
00215 
00216   cbuf_ptr->header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST;
00217   if (resp_handler == 0) {
00218     cbuf_ptr->header.flags |= CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE;
00219     cbuf_ptr->header.id = 0;
00220   }
00221   else {
00222     cbuf_ptr->header.id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00223     if (cbuf_ptr->header.id == 0)
00224       cbuf_ptr->header.id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_request_id);
00225   }
00226 
00227   cbuf_ptr->header.timeout_ms = timeout_ms;
00228   cbuf_ptr->write_header_and_reset();
00229 
00230   if ((error = data_handler->send_message(cbuf_ptr, timeout_ms, resp_handler))
00231       != Error::OK)
00232     data_handler->shutdown();
00233 
00234   return error;
00235 }

00259 void
00260 Comm::create_datagram_receive_socket(struct sockaddr_in *addr, int tos,
00261                                      DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00262   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00263   IOHandlerDatagram *dg_handler;
00264   int one = 1;
00265   int sd;
00266 
00267   if ((sd = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) < 0)
00268     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_SOCKET_ERROR, "%s", strerror(errno));
00269 
00270   // Set to non-blocking
00271   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00272 
00273   int bufsize = 4*32768;
00274 
00275   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize))
00276       < 0) {
00277     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_SNDBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00278   }
00279   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (char *)&bufsize, sizeof(bufsize))
00280       < 0) {
00281     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(SO_RCVBUF) failed - %s", strerror(errno));
00282   }
00283 
00284   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0) {
00285     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_REUSEADDR) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00286   }
00287 
00288   if (tos) {
00289     int opt;
00290 #if defined(__linux__)
00291     opt = tos;
00292     setsockopt(sd, SOL_IP, IP_TOS, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00293     opt = tos;
00294     setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_PRIORITY, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00295 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00296     opt = IPTOS_LOWDELAY;       /* see <netinet/in.h> */
00297     setsockopt(sd, IPPROTO_IP, IP_TOS, &opt, sizeof(opt));
00298 #endif
00299   }
00300 
00301   // bind socket
00302   if ((bind(sd, (const sockaddr *)addr, sizeof(sockaddr_in))) < 0)
00303     HT_THROWF(Error::COMM_BIND_ERROR, "binding to %s: %s",
00304               InetAddr::format(*addr).c_str(), strerror(errno));
00305 
00306   handler = dg_handler = new IOHandlerDatagram(sd, *addr, dhp);
00307 
00308   handler->get_local_address(addr);
00309 
00310   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_datagram_handler(dg_handler);
00311   dg_handler->start_polling();
00312 }

00316 Comm::send_datagram(struct sockaddr_in &addr, struct sockaddr_in &send_addr,
00317                     CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr) {

00319   IOHandlerDatagramPtr dg_handler;
00320   int error = Error::OK;
00321 
00322   if (!m_handler_map_ptr->lookup_datagram_handler(send_addr, dg_handler)) {
00323     HT_ERRORF("Datagram send/local address %s not registered",
00324               InetAddr::format(send_addr).c_str());
00325     HT_ABORT;
00326   }
00327 
00328   cbuf_ptr->header.flags |= (CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST|
00329                              CommHeader::FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE);
00330 
00331   cbuf_ptr->write_header_and_reset();
00332 
00333   if ((error = dg_handler->send_message(addr, cbuf_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00334     dg_handler->shutdown();

00393 int
00394 Comm::connect_socket(int sd, struct sockaddr_in &addr,
00395                      DispatchHandlerPtr &default_handler_ptr) {
00396   IOHandlerPtr handler;
00397   IOHandlerData *data_handler;
00398   int one = 1;
00399 
00400   // Set to non-blocking
00401   FileUtils::set_flags(sd, O_NONBLOCK);
00402 
00403 #if defined(__linux__)
00404   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00405     HT_ERRORF("setsockopt(TCP_NODELAY) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00406 
00407 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00408   if (setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_NOSIGPIPE, &one, sizeof(one)) < 0)
00409     HT_WARNF("setsockopt(SO_NOSIGPIPE) failure: %s", strerror(errno));
00410 #endif
00411 
00412   handler = data_handler = new IOHandlerData(sd, addr, default_handler_ptr);
00413   m_handler_map_ptr->insert_handler(data_handler);
00414 
00415   while (::connect(sd, (struct sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in))
00416           < 0) {
00417     if (errno == EINTR) {
00418       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00419       continue;
00420     }
00421     else if (errno == EINPROGRESS) {
00422       data_handler->start_polling();
00423       data_handler->add_poll_interest(Reactor::READ_READY|Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00424       return Error::OK;
00425     }
00426     HT_ERRORF("connecting to %s: %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(),
00427               strerror(errno));
00428     return Error::COMM_CONNECT_ERROR;
00429   }
00430 
00431   data_handler->start_polling();
00432 
00433   return Error::OK;
00434 }
